AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.undocumented aliens: individuals being smuggled in relation to Maria De Jesus Garcia's case, attempting to hide from United States Border Patrol agents by ducking and scrambling around, potentially indicated by fogged windows of the pickup truck camper on a cold night, with unwashed and dirty clothes and hair
